Quick question about tablets and gadget types
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here) : Quick question about tablets and gadget types
By Metal on Tuesday, April 21, 2009 - 07:45 pm:

Which tablet make which type of training gadgets? So far it seems to me that the stat tablets make the level 2, 3 and 4 gadgets specific to their stat, silvers make effect gadgets and gold makes special level gadgets. I know I must have gotten at least 1 thing from old tablets too but I have absolutely no recolection what. The problem is I must have found at least 15ish silver tablets and I've only found 4 effect gadgets and I'm wondering if maybe there is another type of tablet I'm unaware of or if my data is wrong because that just seems like too much bad luck to be a coincidence.

Also if this is posted somewhere else sorry for the inconvenience but I couldn't find it.
